info.name: IRCCloud Nick-clrs.cc Palette
info.description:
A nicer color palette for nick colouring that fits darker themes. Based on http://clrs.cc/
Can be used with style 97736
Includes option to colourize memberlist.
info.additionalInfo: Colour memberlist: no: default behaviour, only colours nicknames in memberlist on hover. yes: instantly colour all nicknames in memberlist regardless of hover.

options.label: no
yes
